derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Tupi kyynha, quiynha, later associated with Cayenne

means.word_mean: 1. plant bearing very hot and finely tapering long peppers; usually red
2. ground pods and seeds of pungent red peppers of the genus Capsicum
3. a long and often twisted hot red pepper
